subject: Delegation of powers to GM level officers posted as Regional officers in Regional Offices.
text: HRalq <ezf&TrTHf   "ifetan7ur TMIT /Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (ag4 4ar ar <Trrf HEr4) 4H Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0-5 & 6, H4z (-10, ERT, T frzh-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn. 20.03.2011 POLICY MATTERADMNFINANCE (187/2014) (Decision taken on File No. NHAI/11035/01/2009-HR.1) Sub: Delegation of powers to GM level officers posted as Regional Officers in Regional Offices-reg: In partial modification of Office Order No 11041/262/2009-Admn dated 09.09.2009 (Annex-A) and Circular No. NHAI/13/APolicy/2006 dated 06.09.2010 B), it has been decided that the powers delegated to CGMs of Regional Offices under the above mentioned Office Order and Circular shall also be exercised by those (M level officere who are posted as Regional Officers in Regional Offices. 2 This issues with the approval of Chairman: Encl: As above. (V.KSharma) Chief General Manager (LA & Coordl ) To, All officers and employees of HQ/ROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices Yt ?1 NHA (Annex" 2/e)
